about.title: Why Cloud Kitchens?
about.description: The COVID-19 pandemic brought radical changes to the restaurant sector, with many closing while delivery services flourished due to increased demand. As an innovative concept to address this challenge, cloud kitchens emerged as a rewarding investment and business solution.
about.description2: These are consolidated facilities that provide complete infrastructure and logistics services to operate multiple restaurants under one roof, without the need for public-facing space.
about.stat2Label: Cost savings compared to traditional kitchens
about.stat3Label: SAR delivery market size in Saudi Arabia
about.stat4Label: USD expected global market size by 2030

services.description: We offer comprehensive solutions to launch and operate your food project successfully

service1.title: Cloud Kitchens
service1.description: Fully equipped kitchens serving your needs with complete infrastructure and comprehensive logistics services

service2.title: Cold Storage
service2.description: Fully secured refrigerated storage spaces to maintain the quality of your food products

service3.description: Specialized team to support you in all aspects of operations from planning to execution

service4.title: Licenses & Permits
service4.description: We help you obtain all necessary licenses and permits to operate your project

service5.title: Delivery Platforms
service5.description: Work with multiple delivery platforms to ensure your orders reach the largest number of customers

service6.title: Food Consulting
service6.description: Food industry experts to help you develop a distinctive and profitable menu

step3.description: We help you develop a distinctive and profitable menu

testimonials.title: What Our Partners Say
testimonials.description: Success stories from entrepreneurs who started with us

testimonial1.name: Ahmed Al-Shammari
testimonial1.text: Thanks to Bite Box, I was able to launch my restaurant at a much lower cost than expected. The support provided is excellent and the facilities are top-notch.

testimonial2.name: Sara Al-Otaibi
testimonial2.text: The flexibility in contracting and various spaces helped me start quickly. I recommend every entrepreneur to try cloud kitchens.

testimonial3.name: Mohammed Al-Qahtani
testimonial3.text: We saved 44% of operational costs after moving to cloud kitchens. An excellent strategic decision to expand our business.

faq.title: Answers to Your Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about cloud kitchens
faq.a1: Cloud kitchens are fully equipped facilities for preparing food for delivery only, without space for receiving customers. They provide complete infrastructure to operate your restaurant efficiently.
faq.q2: How much does it cost to start?
faq.a2: The cost varies depending on the kitchen size and required services. We offer various options to suit all budgets with savings up to 44% compared to traditional restaurants.
faq.q3: Do you help with obtaining licenses?
faq.a3: Yes, we provide full support to obtain all necessary licenses and permits to operate your project legally.
faq.a4: We offer flexibility in contracting with multiple options starting from monthly to annual contracts according to your needs.
faq.q5: Can I work with multiple delivery platforms?
faq.a5: Absolutely! We help you integrate with all major delivery platforms to expand your customer reach.
